ovdesc.p: This application is provided in order to record DIARY events for a facility. The DIARY events may be recorded at the Facility level, tranche level or loan level. Specific covenants applicable to a single (or group) participants or a particular customer may also be defined.

The list of standard diary activities / covenants may be recorded in SL.DIARY.CODES. The ID of SL.DIARY.CODES would be 1-6 alpha numeric character. The general and short descriptions of the codes may also be entered in this table and used in SL.DIARY application.

desc.p: Short description of the diary code. Diary codes could be listed in this table and picked in field DIARY.CODE in SL.DIARY application
The ID of SL.DIARY.CODES would be 1-6 alpha numeric character.
